Text: Audio seems to be out of sync.

Okay this really weird, when i change the extension from m4v to mp4 the sync problem goes away.
Anyone care to explain?
your pc or standalone device is screwy.  The file is fine.

I can confirm about the audio delay in wmp and mpc-hc, and changing the extansion from .m4v to .mp4 doesn't fix the problem. But, it works fine using vlc. 

Thanks
2 different issues.  first was a flaw with WDTV player, 2nd is a codec issue on your pc.
